AVERAGEX(
    SUMMARIZE(
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due',
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_InvoiceID],
        "DelayPerInvoice", AVERAGE('Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_ReceivingDelayDays])
    ),
    [DelayPerInvoice]
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"TotalDelayDays","dataType":3,"expression":"

    SUMMARIZE(
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due',
        'Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_InvoiceID],
        "DelayDays", AVERAGE('Report_Payment_Vs_Due'[Inv_ReceivingDelayDays])
    ),
    [DelayDays]
)","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}}]},{"name":"Fact_BillbackUnbilledEvents","extends":"Fact_BillbackUnbilledEvents","measures":[{"name":"Client","dataType":3,"expression":"
VAR SelectedValue = SELECTEDVALUE('Fact_BillbackUnbilledEvents'[CLIENT_ID])
RETURN
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(SelectedValue), "All", -- No selection
        SelectedValue = 3, "PO",
        SelectedValue = 23, "5Y",
        "All" -- fallback
    )
","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}}]},{"name":"Fact_BillbackInvoice","extends":"Fact_BillbackInvoice","measures":[{"name":"Client_billback","dataType":3,"expression":"

RETURN
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(SelectedValue), "All", -- No selection
        SelectedValue = 3, "PO",
        SelectedValue = 23, "5Y",

    )
","errorMessage":null,"hidden":false,"formulaOverride":null,"formatInformation":{"formatString":"G","format":"General","thousandSeparator":false,"currencyFormat":null,"dateTimeCustomFormat":null}},{"name":"InvoiceAmountInRange","dataType":3,"expression":"

    SUM('Fact_BillbackInvoice'[InvoiceAmountSys]),

    )
